recipe.title: Lemon Bread
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 cup butter 1 cup sugar 2 eggs 1 tsp. lemon rind, grated 1/8 tsp. lemon extract 1 1/2 cups flour 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1/8 tsp. salt 1/2 cup milk Glaze: 1/2 cup sugar juice of 1 lemon
recipe.steps: Cream together butter and sugar. Slight beat eggs, and stir into butter mixture. Add lemon rind, flour, baking powder, salt and milk; mix well Pour batter into greased loaf pan and bake for 55-60 minutes; remove from oven Combine sugar and lemon juice; drizzle over hot bread while still in the pan Cool 10 minutes, remove from pan and cool. Serving suggestions and Notes: Fresh blueberries or raspberries are a nice addition to this bread.
